description.en: Complete HEOS integration with account-based setup. Automatically discovers all your Denon/Marantz HEOS devices and provides comprehensive control including multi-room grouping, favorites, input sources, and music services.

value.en:
This integration uses your HEOS account to automatically discover and control all your HEOS devices. You'll need:

• IP address of any HEOS device on your network
• Your HEOS account username and password

All configured devices on your account will be automatically discovered as separate media player entities with full functionality including grouping, favorites, inputs, and music services.
